function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Manual contact tracing is ineffective in identifying all possible close contacts, hindering the effectiveness of contact tracing.","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected transmission and spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementation of automated contact tracing solutions using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and wearable devices to improve accuracy and coverage of close contact identification.","Technologies":"Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) based contact tracing applications, wearable devices, automated data capture and storage.","People":"General population, individuals at risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, technology companies."},{"Description":"Pure GPS-based contact tracing solutions lack the accuracy to identify close contacts within a few meters.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in identifying close contacts in the case of contagious disease transmission, leading to potential spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Integration of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) with GPS data to improve accuracy and range of contact tracing, and development of hybrid solutions combining both technologies.","Technologies":"Integration of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) with GPS data, development of hybrid contact tracing solutions.","People":"General population, individuals at risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, technology companies."}]}
